name: Blast Em
overview: Shooter created with AMOS by Lee C. Wilson of delta9. Blast our way through no less than 50 levels of alien action. Simply blast everything that moves. During the game, aliens will drop power crystals that can be collected by moving the yellow rectangle at the top of the screen. Weapons can be changed out during play. Click P to catch a breath. Nice little game, quick and quite addictive.
